price: Aad (Nkorͻfoͻ no) faa no atorᴐsԑm. Na sεdeε M’asotwee ne Me kͻkͻbͻ (huu) siteε?
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: kadhabat ʿādun fakayfa kāna ʿadhābī wanudhuri
